english.segment1: Magnificent Holy Father. I stand in awe of all I see. Of all the things You have created. But still You choose to think of me
english.segment2: Who am I that You should suffer. Your very life to set me free. The only thing that I can give You. Is the life You gave to me
english.segment3: This is my offering, dear Lord. This is my offering to You, God. And I will give You my life. For it's all I have to give. Because You gave Your life for me
english.segment4: I stand before You at this altar. So many have given You more. I may not have much I can offer. Yet what I have is truly Yours
